column2: The Daily Bucket: The Marsh Supremacy: A Gray Ghost Territorial Battle
column5: Swan Lake NSA Lemmon Valley (Reno) Nevada USA March 21 2015 This will be a photo diary as the action speaks for itself. Gray Ghost is a nickname given to male Northern Harriers as they are seen nowhere near as often as the females.Â Bigger story image.
